title: "STMicroelectronics releases first automotive IMU with embedded machine learning"
excerpt: "This enables sophisticated real-time performance that demands far lower system energy and computing power than a solution embedded on an application processor or cloud-based AI. Demonstration boards and free software example libraries are available to simplify application development."
